title: Drawing, "verso: Studies of an arm and hand", 1775–1800
medium: Red and white chalk on blue paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Recto: a monk or priest is shown turned toward the right, in profile. In the upper left corner, a study for a part of the head, and two more head studies beside, at right. Below are two studies for a left hand shown from the palm with thumb and forefinger touching each other.  Verso: twice, the right arm of a woman in profile, her hand holding drapery.  A study for the hand. Below, at left, a left hand holding a stem.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "verso: Studies of an arm and hand", 1775–1800.
1775–1800. Red and white chalk on blue paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-80.
